p:
Using quantitative ELISA, the levels of Th1/Th2 cytokines including IFN-γ, IL-2, IL-4, and TNF-α were analyzed from the culture supernatants of splenocytes, collected at 48 and 72 h of incubation. Freshly isolated splenocytes (1 × 10 6 cells) were added to each well and stimulated with inactivated rVet and rSH at a concentration of 4 μg/ml as described earlier
17, 60 .
